personal.name: Long (Leon) Tran
personal.title: Fullstack Web Developer
aboutText: I'm a passionate Fullstack Web Developer currently based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, with over 3 years of professional experience building scalable web applications and mobile solutions. Currently working as a Junior Fullstack Developer at Cyberlogitec Vietnam, where I focus on building end-to-end logistics pricing systems and scalable backend services using modern technologies like NestJS, Next.js, TypeScript, and cloud services.

My technical expertise spans across the entire development stack - from creating intuitive user interfaces with React.js and TypeScript to building robust backend systems with Node.js, Express.js, and databases like MongoDB and PostgreSQL. I've successfully reduced application load times by 25% through optimization techniques and maintained 99.9% uptime for critical systems using load balancing and cloud infrastructure.

What drives me is solving complex technical challenges while delivering exceptional user experiences. I have hands-on experience with real-time applications using WebRTC and Socket.io, mobile development with React Native, and DevOps practices with Docker. I'm constantly learning new technologies and best practices to stay at the forefront of web development, with a particular interest in performance optimization, scalable architecture, and emerging web technologies.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end web application development using modern technologies like React, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud services.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: Cross-platform mobile applications using React Native with real-time features and cloud integration.

services.title: API Development
services.description: RESTful APIs and GraphQL services with robust authentication, database integration, and scalable architecture.

services.title: DevOps & Cloud
services.description: Deployment automation, containerization with Docker, and cloud infrastructure management on AWS.

testimonials.text: Richard was hired to create a corporate identity. We were very pleased with the work done. She has a lot of experience and is very concerned about the needs of client. testimonials.text: Excellent work! Richard delivered everything on time and exceeded our expectations. The design is modern and user-friendly.

testimonials.name: Henry William
testimonials.text: Outstanding quality and attention to detail. I highly recommend Richard for any web development project.

learnings: Software Development Principles and Best Practices

experience.description:
• Engineered and deployed an end-to-end logistics pricing system that streamlined route optimization and reduced manual calculation time by 30%
• Developed scalable backend services with NestJS (DDD + Clean Architecture), improving system maintainability and enabling faster feature delivery
• Built dynamic Next.js interfaces for pricing configuration, enhancing workflow efficiency and reducing setup errors by 20%
• Implemented logistics business logic for route pricing, cargo allocation, and real-time cost evaluation to improve operational accuracy
• Collaborated with QA, DevOps, and Product teams to deliver high-quality solutions tailored to logistics clients’ needs
• Applied modern architecture and testing practices, increasing overall code quality and test coverage by 25%

• Implemented new features improving user satisfaction and workflow efficiency using React, TypeScript, and JavaScript
• Reduced application load time by 25% through query optimization, database indexing, and responsive design improvements
• Maintained 99.9% uptime for critical APIs using HAProxy load balancing and monitoring systems
• Enhanced security and accessibility via Cloudflare Tunnel configuration and SSL implementation
• Improved code quality by enforcing consistent coding standards and implementing automated testing

• Built responsive landing pages using Next.js to expand customer reach and improve conversion rates
• Developed comprehensive customer portals using Node.js, React.js, Prisma ORM, and MySQL database
• Optimized site performance via image compression, lazy loading, and efficient caching strategies
• Collaborated with designers and stakeholders to develop intuitive user interfaces and user experiences
• Delivered projects on time and within budget while maintaining high code quality standards

• Developed automated web crawlers using Puppeteer to enhance lead generation and data collection processes
• Created Callbox Chrome extension for seamless CRM-integrated calling functionality
• Automated daily check-in processes using Google App Script with Mattermost integration
• Gained hands-on experience with modern development workflows and agile methodologies
• Contributed to code reviews and participated in team knowledge sharing sessions

frontend.name: HTML5
frontend.description: The standard markup language for creating web pages. Expert in semantic HTML, accessibility, and modern HTML5 features.

frontend.name: CSS3
frontend.description: Cascading Style Sheets for web design and layout. Proficient in modern CSS features, animations, and responsive design.

frontend.name: SASS
frontend.description: CSS preprocessor that adds power and elegance to CSS with variables, mixins, and advanced features.

frontend.name: JavaScript
frontend.description: The core programming language of the web. I have deep expertise in modern JavaScript (ES6+) for both frontend and backend development, with a strong focus on clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
experience: ES6+ features (arrow functions, destructuring, async/await, modules)
Asynchronous programming with Promises and async/await
Modern build tools and bundlers (Webpack, Vite)
projects: Data Visualization Dashboard - Complex DOM manipulation

frontend.name: TypeScript
frontend.description: A strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, providing better tooling and error detection. I use TypeScript to write more reliable and maintainable code across both frontend and backend applications.
experience: 2+ years of TypeScript development in production
Advanced type system usage (generics, utility types, mapped types)
Interface and type definition design for APIs
Integration with React for type-safe component development
Backend development with Node.js and TypeScript
Configuration and setup of TypeScript projects
Migration of JavaScript codebases to TypeScript
projects: Component Library - Reusable React components with TypeScript

frontend.name: React
frontend.description: A powerful JavaScript library for building interactive user interfaces with component-based architecture. I have extensive experience creating scalable, maintainable web applications using React's ecosystem.
experience: Built complex SPAs with React Router for navigation
Expertise in React Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext, custom hooks)
State management with Redux Toolkit and Zustand
Performance optimization with React.memo, useMemo, useCallback
Component testing with React Testing Library
projects: Whispchat - Real-time messaging app with React Native
E-commerce Dashboard - Admin panel with complex data visualization

backend.name: Node.js
backend.description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine for server-side development. I leverage Node.js to build scalable backend services, APIs, and real-time applications with high performance and efficiency.
experience: RESTful API development with Express.js and Fastify
Real-time applications with Socket.IO and WebSockets
Package management with npm and yarn
projects: FastHire API - Job matching platform backend
E-commerce Platform - Scalable shopping cart system

database.name: MongoDB
database.description: A NoSQL document database that provides high performance, high availability, and easy scalability. I use MongoDB for flexible data modeling and efficient storage solutions in modern web applications.
experience: 2+ years working with MongoDB in production environments
Aggregation pipeline for complex data queries
Integration with Node.js using Mongoose ODM
Replica sets and sharding for scalability
projects: Whispchat Database - Message storage and user management
E-commerce Platform - Product catalog and order management
Analytics Dashboard - Event tracking and reporting system

projects.title: Whispchat
projects.description: Real-time chat application with support for all message types and WebRTC-based audio/video streaming. Built with React Native, Node.js, TypeScript, Socket.io, MongoDB, Auth0, AWS S3, WebRTC, and GraphQL.

projects.title: Gcalls Platform
projects.description: Enterprise-level communication platform with features for lead generation, CRM integration, and real-time communication tools.

projects.title: Customer Portal Systems
projects.description: Custom customer portal solutions built with Node.js, React.js, Prisma, and MySQL for various clients during freelance work.

projects.title: Chrome Extension - Callbox
projects.description: Chrome extension for CRM-integrated calling functionality, streamlining communication workflows for sales teams.

projects.title: Web Crawling Solutions
projects.description: Automated web crawlers built with Puppeteer for lead generation and data collection to enhance business processes.

projects.title: Landing Pages Collection
projects.description: Responsive landing pages built with Next.js, optimized for performance and conversion, helping clients expand their customer reach.
